<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The SuspendCrossingInfo maintains data that allows to answer a question</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// whether given two BasicBlocks A and B there is a path from A to B that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// passes through a suspend point. Note, SuspendCrossingInfo is invalidated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by changes to the CFG including adding/removing BBs due to its use of BB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ptrs in the BlockToIndexMapping.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB : RPOT) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BBNo = Mapping.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blocktoindexmapping/#a293d369dc3789d0af9867c32809f090a">blockToIndex</a>(BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>&#91;BBNo&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We don&#39;t need to count the predecessors when initialization.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Initialize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If all the predecessors of the current Block don&#39;t change,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the BlockData for the current block must not change too.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0d10fe510ced2849a8074fe81e5d04ce">all&#95;of</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acb22fb04083152eee862457e42e8dc31">predecessors</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>), &#91;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>&#91;Mapping.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blocktoindexmapping/#a293d369dc3789d0af9867c32809f090a">blockToIndex</a>(BB)&#93;.Changed;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Changed = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Saved Consumes and Kills bitsets so that it is easy to see</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if anything changed after propagation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SavedConsumes = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Consumes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SavedKills = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Kills;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BasicBlock &#42;PI : predecessors(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PrevNo = Mapping.blockToIndex(PI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = Block&#91;PrevNo&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Propagate Kills and Consumes from predecessors into B.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Consumes |= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>.Consumes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Kills |= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>.Kills;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If block P is a suspend block, it should propagate kills into block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// B for every block P consumes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>.Suspend)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Kills |= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>.Consumes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Suspend) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If block B is a suspend block, it should kill all of the blocks it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// consumes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Kills |= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Consumes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.End) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If block B is an end block, it should not propagate kills as the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// blocks following coro.end() are reached during initial invocation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the coroutine while all the data are still available on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stack or in the registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Kills.reset();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is reached when B block it not Suspend nor coro.end and it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// need to make sure that it is not in the kill set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.KillLoop |= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Kills&#91;BBNo&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Kills.reset(BBNo);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Initialize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Changed = (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Kills != SavedKills) || (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Consumes != SavedConsumes);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> |= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Changed;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Changed = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mark all CoroEnd Blocks. We do not propagate Kills beyond coro.ends as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the code beyond coro.end is reachable during initial invocation of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// coroutine.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;CE : CoroEnds) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Verify CoroEnd was normalized</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CE-&gt;getParent()-&gt;getFirstInsertionPt() == CE-&gt;getIterator() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">           CE-&gt;getParent()-&gt;size() &lt;= 2 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;CoroEnd must be in its own BB&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    getBlockData(CE-&gt;getParent()).End = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mark all suspend blocks and indicate that they kill everything they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// consume. Note, that crossing coro.save also requires a spill, as any code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between coro.save and coro.suspend may resume the coroutine and all of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// state needs to be saved by that time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> markSuspendBlock = &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrinsicinst">IntrinsicInst</a> &#42;BarrierInst) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;SuspendBlock = BarrierInst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a1b4bf7c97cdc8159fd73d48063f0b250">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> = getBlockData(SuspendBlock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Suspend = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Kills |= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Consumes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;CSI : CoroSuspends) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Verify CoroSuspend was normalized</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CSI-&gt;getParent()-&gt;getFirstInsertionPt() == CSI-&gt;getIterator() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">           CSI-&gt;getParent()-&gt;size() &lt;= 2 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;CoroSuspend must be in its own BB&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    markSuspendBlock(CSI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Save = CSI-&gt;getCoroSave())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">      markSuspendBlock(Save);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is considered to be faster to use RPO traversal for forward-edges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dataflow analysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/reversepostordertraversal">ReversePostOrderTraversal&lt;Function &#42;&gt;</a> RPOT(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  computeBlockData&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Initialize=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&gt;(RPOT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (computeBlockData&lt;/&#42;Initialize&#42;/ false&gt;(RPOT))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suspendcrossinginfo/#ae0841bca835cfc99fa124abaca92ea47">dump</a>());</span></CodeLine>
